headline: Behr Unveils Second Annual Commercial Color Forecast and New Designer Council
summary: Today, Behr Paint Company announces its 2026 Commercial Color Forecast, a curated collection of colors rooted in elemental harmony—a thoughtful approach to color that balances natural elements, nostalgic touches, and technology influences. Designers and industry professionals will have a first look at the 2026 Commercial Color Forecast at NeoCon starting today through June 11, 2025 in Chicago.

content.title: Behr Unveils Second Annual Commercial Color Forecast and New Designer Council
content.summary: Today, Behr Paint Company announces its 2026 Commercial Color Forecast, a curated collection of colors rooted in elemental harmony—a thoughtful approach to color that balances natural elements, nostalgic touches, and technology influences. Designers and industry professionals will have a first look at the 2026 Commercial Color Forecast at NeoCon starting today through June 11, 2025 in Chicago.

thumbnail.caption:
BEHR's 2026 Commercial Color Forecast includes a subpalette titled "SOULScape” featuring colors that create a sense of playfulness and serenity within a space. Stonewashed Brown (N190-2) coats the walls of this healthcare facility to create an inviting hallway for patients. 

Original photography and design by Bethany Nauert and Allie Bell. Paint color by Behr Paint Company.
